item.description:
Launch from Jenness State Beach at 10:00 a.m. Depending on the group, we'll make the decision as to the direction of paddle.....(1) north up the coast past Rye Harbor on to Wallis Sands beach or (2) south down the coast to North Hampton Beach. Off the water by 3:00 p.m.

Total distance will be less than 10 miles round trip.

Expected conditions: Mostly sunny with temperatures from 35-45 degrees F outside, slight winds 5-10 mph from the W or SW. This will be an onshore wind (blowing from the shore). Hugging the shore the sea will be calm but small chop and wind gust if we venture out a bit. Swells will be 1-2 ft at 7 or 8 secs. This will create a mild shoreline with small breaking waves at the beach or rocks.

A drysuit or full 5mm wetsuit is REQUIRED to paddle with us on this trip. You should have some previous experience in ocean chop and surf.

If you have a short surf or WW boat, we may spend some time surfing at Jenness, depending on conditions and who shows up.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking public parking lot at the beach
item.name: Ocean Paddle/Surf Session
